body:
Jogn Mardaljevis has developed an annual sky model based on climate data:
http://www.thedaylightsite.com/filebank/Climate%20Based%20Daylight%20Modelling.pdf


I've had the good fortune to have been able to work with it ( cheers John! )
and it is such a wonderful model.
Surely a huge contribution to daylight design!


-jelle
